successes.title: Michron: Timelapse for Everyone
successes.description: An affordable, user-inspired timelapse device for beginning and advanced photographers.

Pledges.description: Hall of Fame! Seriously, thank you so much for your support! We'll keep you updated during the project and your name will be forever honored on our website!

First Backers!
You will receive one Michron, a trigger cable, and a programming cable. You will be able to download the Michron app for free in the app store.

Kickstarter Special! You will receive one Michron, a trigger cable, and a programming cable. You will be able to download the Michron app for free in the app store. Save some money and reserve one now!

Michron and virtual meeting with Steve or Greg. Schedule a meeting for 30 minutes with Steve or Greg on video or phone chat. Discussion topics are entirely up to you and can range from more information about Vivo Labs and starting up or a photography lesson. You will also get a Michron, a trigger cable, and a programming cable.
Beta Tester. Get a 3D printed, hand assembled prototype and help us put Michron through its paces. And don't worry, you'll still get your production Michron and a 30 minute virtual meeting.

The Super Backer: In addition to getting a prototype and production Michron, come meet Greg or Steve for a full day of shooting anywhere in California. We'll teach you everything we know about photography and timelapse and will work with you on your special projects. Whether you want to shoot cityscapes in San Francisco or stunning landscapes in the Sierra Nevada, we will meet you there for a fun, engaging day of shooting. (You will need to provide your own travel arrangements)
